General.Name: Taisun Enterprise Co Ltd
General.Description: Taisun Enterprise Co., Ltd. operates in the food and beverage industry in Taiwan. The company operates through four segments: Consumption, Commodity, Foreign, and Other. It offers flour products comprising soy flour, high protein soy flour, and full-fat cooked soy flour; oil products, including rice bran oil, sunflower oil, canola oil, soybean oil, palm oil, olive oil, grapeseed oil, and blended oil; and feed products comprising milkfish, nile fish, sweetfish, striped bass, grouper, shrimp feed, and aquatic feed, such as eels. The company also provides grass jelly and mixed congee products; cheers sparkling water; taishan pure water and twistwater water products; BUFF dual-effect energy drink; woo tang grass tea; ten valley treasure; grass honey; Bing Jeon black tea; and grape ice tea products, as well as granular beverages, such as the big straw series cha street products and nuts effect almond milk. Further, it engages in livestock farming; sale of food, beverages, and snacks; and operation of beverage stores. Taisun Enterprise Co., Ltd. was founded in 1950 and is headquartered in Taipe, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 99, Chang?an East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
